targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select if(msfo.v == 0, rsbu.month, msfo.month) as month, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" , rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)"
from (select month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by month
    order by month
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-06-29')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-09-29')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-30')) as month, 34 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-11-30')) as month, 35 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-12-30')) as month, 36 as v)
) as msfo
FULL JOIN (select month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by month
    order by month) as rsbu on (toDate(toStartOfMonth(msfo.month)) == toDate(toStartOfMonth(rsbu.month)))
order by month
targets.rawQuery:
select if(msfo.v == 0, rsbu.month, msfo.month) as month, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" , rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)"
from (select month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by month
    order by month
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-06-29')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-09-29')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-30')) as month, 34 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-11-30')) as month, 35 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-12-30')) as month, 36 as v)
) as msfo
FULL JOIN (select month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by month
    order by month) as rsbu on (toDate(toStartOfMonth(msfo.month)) == toDate(toStartOfMonth(rsbu.month)))
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol, last_value(value) as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1   and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month, last_value(value) as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1   and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM $table

WHERE
    $timeFilter
    and sec_code = 'VTBR' and period = '6'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 43200) * 43200) * 1000 as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM default.candles

WHERE
    date >= toDateTime(1542869672) AND date <= toDateTime(1637564072)
    and sec_code = 'VTBR' and period = '6'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM $table
WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted(close*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock price"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDate(1480059140) AND date <= toDate(1637825540)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select if(msfo.v == 0, rsbu.month, msfo.month) as month, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" , rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)"
from (select publish as month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by month
    order by month
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-07-29')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-28')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-11-30')) as month, 34 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-12-30')) as month, 35 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2022-01-30')) as month, 36 as v)
) as msfo
FULL JOIN (select publish as month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by month
    order by month) as rsbu on (toDate(toStartOfMonth(msfo.month)) == toDate(toStartOfMonth(rsbu.month)))
order by month
targets.rawQuery:
select if(msfo.v == 0, rsbu.month, msfo.month) as month, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" , rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)"
from (select publish as month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by month
    order by month
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-07-29')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-28')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-11-30')) as month, 34 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-12-30')) as month, 35 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2022-01-30')) as month, 36 as v)
) as msfo
FULL JOIN (select publish as month, last_value(value) as v
    from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by month
    order by month) as rsbu on (toDate(toStartOfMonth(msfo.month)) == toDate(toStartOfMonth(rsbu.month)))
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select msfo.publish, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" from (select publish, last_value(value) as v
from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by publish
    order by publish
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-27')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-07-30')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-04-30')) as month, 26.7 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-02-28')) as month, 29.2 as v)
) as msfo
order by msfo.publish
targets.rawQuery:
select msfo.publish, msfo.v as "Чистая прибыль(МСФО)" from (select publish, last_value(value) as v
from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name)
    group by publish
    order by publish
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-10-27')) as month, 33.2 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-07-30')) as month, 26.3 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-04-30')) as month, 26.7 as v)
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(parseDateTimeBestEffortOrNull('2021-02-28')) as month, 29.2 as v)
) as msfo
order by msfo.publish

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    min(low*1000)/1000 as "Stock low price"
FROM $table
WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '4' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    min(low*1000)/1000 as "Stock low price"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDate(1609441200) AND date <= toDate(1640977199)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '4' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    max(high*1000)/1000 as "Stock high price"
FROM $table
WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '4' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    max(high*1000)/1000 as "Stock high price"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDate(1609441200) AND date <= toDate(1640977199)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '4' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted((low+high)/2*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock VTBR price"
FROM $table
WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

    toStartOfInterval(date, INTERVAL 7 day) as t,
    avgWeighted((low+high)/2*1000, volume)/1000 as "Stock VTBR price"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDate(1609638407) AND date <= toDate(1637825292)
    and sec_code == 'VTBR' and period == '5' 
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

WHERE
    date >= toDate($from) AND date <= toDate($to)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select rsbu.publish, rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)" from (select publish, last_value(value) as v
from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by publish
    order by publish
) as rsbu
order by rsbu.publish
targets.rawQuery:
select rsbu.publish, rsbu.v as "Чистая прибыль(РСБУ)" from (select publish, last_value(value) as v
from default.finance_results
    where standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1
    group by publish
    order by publish
) as rsbu
order by rsbu.publish

panels.title: Чистая прибыль на дату публикации, млрд. руб.

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol,
last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'ЧОД до резервов'), value, NULL)) as "ЧОД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые процентные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧПД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые комиссионные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧКД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прочие операционные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ПОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы', 'Создание резерва под обесценение', 'Создание резерва под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резервы",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Расходы на содержание персонала и административные расходы'), value, NULL)) as "Расходы"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month,
last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'ЧОД до резервов'), value, NULL)) as "ЧОД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые процентные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧПД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые комиссионные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧКД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прочие операционные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ПОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы', 'Создание резерва под обесценение', 'Создание резерва под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резервы",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Расходы на содержание персонала и административные расходы'), value, NULL)) as "Расходы"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО' and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol,
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Чистая прибыль",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'ЧОД до резервов'), value, NULL)) as "ЧОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы', 'Создание резерва под обесценение', 'Создание резерва под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резервы"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'   and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month,
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Чистая прибыль / (убыток)', 'Чистая прибыль'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Чистая прибыль",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'ЧОД до резервов'), value, NULL)) as "ЧОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы', 'Создание резерва под обесценение', 'Создание резерва под кредитные убытки и прочие резервы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резервы"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'   and category ==  'Ключевые показатели P&L'
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select month, name, runningDifference(last_value(value))
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Прочие операционные доходы', 'Прочие операционные доходы и расходы'), category) == 1
group by month, name
order by month
targets.rawQuery:
select month, name, runningDifference(last_value(value))
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Прочие операционные доходы', 'Прочие операционные доходы и расходы'), category) == 1
group by month, name
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select month, name, runningDifference(last_value(value))
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Чистые комиссионные доходы'), category) == 1
group by month, name
order by month
targets.rawQuery:
select month, name, runningDifference(last_value(value))
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'МСФО'  and has(array('Чистые комиссионные доходы'), category) == 1
group by month, name
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые процентные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧПД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые комиссионные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧКД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прочие чистые операционные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ПОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под обесценение', 'Операционные расходы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резерв"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые процентные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧПД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистые комиссионные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ЧКД",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прочие чистые операционные доходы'), value, NULL)) as "ПОД",
       last_value(multiIf(has(array('Создание резервов под обесценение', 'Операционные расходы'), name) == 1, value, NULL)) as "Резерв"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ'
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистая прибыль'), value, NULL)) as "Чистая прибыль",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прибыль до налогообложения'), value, NULL)) as "Прибыль"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Чистая прибыль'), value, NULL)) as "Чистая прибыль",
       last_value(multiIf(equals(name,'Прибыль до налогообложения'), value, NULL)) as "Прибыль"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ'
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol, sum(value) as "Доход-расход"
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистые процентные доходы','Чистые комиссионные доходы','Прочие чистые операционные доходы','Создание резервов под обесценение','Расходы на содержание персонала и 
  административные расходы', 'Операционные расходы'), name) == 1
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month, sum(value) as "Доход-расход"
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ' and has(array('Чистые процентные доходы','Чистые комиссионные доходы','Прочие чистые операционные доходы','Создание резервов под обесценение','Расходы на содержание персонала и 
  административные расходы', 'Операционные расходы'), name) == 1
group by month
order by month

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select $dateCol, last_value(value) as ROE
from $table
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ' and name == 'Рентабельность капитала (ROE)'
group by $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select month, last_value(value) as ROE
from default.finance_results
where code == 'VTBR' and standard == 'РСБУ' and name == 'Рентабельность капитала (ROE)'
group by month
order by month
